tools.title: Architecture trade-off analysis
tools.purpose: Compare options against constraints and non-functional requirements.

tools.title: Certificate viewer
tools.purpose: Inspect certificate fields and trust cues.

tools.title: Control mapping tool
tools.purpose: Map controls to standards at a conceptual level (ISO, NIST, SOC 2).

tools.title: Data classification helper
tools.purpose: Classify sensitivity and handling requirements in plain terms.

tools.title: Decision log generator
tools.purpose: Create auditable records of decisions and rationale.

tools.title: DNS lookup
tools.purpose: Look up DNS records for a public hostname (server-assisted).

tools.title: Entropy and hashing
tools.purpose: Visualise randomness and the avalanche effect.

tools.title: Incident post-mortem builder
tools.purpose: Create learning-focused post-incident reviews and actions.

tools.title: JavaScript sandbox
tools.purpose: Test JS behaviour and parsing safely.

tools.title: Logic gate simulator
tools.purpose: Learn AND/OR/XOR with truth tables.

tools.title: Metrics definition studio
tools.purpose: Define useful metrics and avoid vanity measurements.

tools.title: Password entropy meter
tools.purpose: Compare length vs complexity trade-offs.

tools.title: Process friction mapper
tools.purpose: Identify where process slows delivery or creates risk.

tools.title: Python playground
tools.purpose: Run small Python experiments in-browser (Pyodide).

tools.title: Regex tester
tools.purpose: Extract patterns and groups from sample text.

tools.title: Risk register builder
tools.purpose: Structure and prioritise risks with likelihood, impact, and mitigations.

tools.title: RSA lab (OAEP + SHA-256)
tools.purpose: Generate keys and explain asymmetric crypto.

tools.title: Sandbox echo
tools.purpose: Send a short message to the secure runner and get it back.

tools.title: Schema inspector
tools.purpose: Explore entities, fields, and relationships.

tools.title: SQL sandbox (SQLite)
tools.purpose: Practise queries and joins locally.

tools.title: Technical debt qualifier
tools.purpose: Describe and prioritise debt with impact, cost, and risk.

tools.title: Threat modelling lite
tools.purpose: Run a STRIDE-style walkthrough without diagrams.

tools.title: WHOIS summary (safe)
tools.purpose: Quick, safe domain context and guidance (educational fallback).
